content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Production Line
Consists of two furnaces working in parallel:
- Stone furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) processing copper ore
- Stone furnace at position (2.0, 0.0) processing copper ore

### Iron/Steel Production
- Stone furnace at position (4.0, 4.0) processing iron ore

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line
Located around position (9.5, 11.5), consists of:
- Input wooden chest at (6.5, 11.5) containing iron plates and copper cables
- Burner inserter at (7.5, 11.5) moving materials from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine 1 at (9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at (11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output wooden chest at (12.5, 11.5) storing finished electronic circuits

### Power Generation System
Located around position (-7.0, 24.5), consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) providing water
- Pipe network connecting water system
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5) converting water to steam
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Electric pole network distributing power

### Science Pack Storage and Research
Located around position (0.5, 30.5), consists of:
- Wooden chest at (0.5, 31.5) storing science packs
- Burner inserter at (0.5, 30.5) feeding lab
- Lab (position not directly specified) conducting research

ERROR TIPS

### Research-related errors
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research it again (occurred with Logistics and Automation technologies)

### Extraction errors
- Verify items are available in the source before attempting extraction
- Make sure the target entity exists at the specified position before attempting extraction

### Inventory management errors
- Monitor inventory space before attempting to harvest resources to prevent "Inventory is full" errors

### Crafting errors
- Ensure sufficient raw materials are available before attempting to craft items
- When crafting fails partially (e.g., "Successfully crafted 15x but failed to craft 35x"), consider breaking down large crafting requests into smaller batches

### Resource insertion errors
- Verify fuel (coal) availability in inventory before attempting to insert into machines
- Check machine fuel levels regularly to maintain continuous operation
